block.p: The Department of Defense has identified 2,191 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It confirmed the deaths of the following Americans yesterday:
CANN, Adam L., 23, Sgt., Marines; Davie, Fla.; Security Battalion, Camp Pendleton, attached to Second Marine Division.
FIELD, Nathan R., 23, Sgt., Army Reserve; Lehigh, Iowa; 4249th Port Security Company.
GETTINGS, Albert P., 27, Cpl., Marines; New Castle, Pa.; Second Marine Division.
JOHNSON, Robert T., 20, Specialist, Army Reserve; Erwin, N.C.; 805th Military Police Company.
McCURDY, Ryan S., 20, Lance Cpl., Marines; Baton Rouge, La.; Second Marine Division.
The Department of Defense has identified 2,191 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It confirmed the deaths of the following Americans yesterday:.
